Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires a warning label to be printed on or attached to juice containers commonly known as juice boxes
Summary: Requires a warning label to be printed on or attached to juice containers commonly known as juice boxes; provides that such label shall include a warning that the straw's packaging included with the juice box is a choking hazard for children and should be disposed of immediately; defines "juice container" as being in either box or pouch form.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to labeling of juice containers
